# Neutron Live Peers
Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
PEERS=973b06bf20719128b4d0a4affe6219ac0f838bb4@162.55.242.150:32656,c64e21b5c51a1d6498b9f7e21f518b6b4e40de7a@141.95.23.182:26656,9cb73281f6774e42176905e548c134fc45bbe579@162.55.134.54:26656,d8679e0836931bcafe06d6d0345cbddc06810dc5@167.235.7.34:56656,431d92adb826aae382ff9c19f5d0e636687742f5@65.108.77.106:26919,cd7b92ba91aac2e7c38020438cfb33b66d2b6c3d@23.88.73.211:34656,481527109614db304006ed35d97eac4476ce9238@5.161.105.129:26656,0276ebe970cb127d69b9759ffadb2b6a28796c22@74.208.217.96:26656,5bdc67a5d5219aeda3c743e04fdcd72dcb150ba3@65.109.31.114:2480,3548d75dfcff01f0415644faefc9057b5d560dd5@139.177.193.146:26656,acc9092cdff14a3b57623b71e3af5fb1bab287dd@135.181.115.115:26656,55966d8c15c1e0610ac96b3da6e77204b02e5329@139.177.193.233:26656,2be40413d0e91eb4bffad9c4a7d1d74ce4510586@65.108.227.112:26656,3cce220fbbd9829410659924051a1ec27d507fcf@170.187.181.18:26656,10f35be47fe8660fd1d06856d7baf30b10e57009@65.109.82.106:2126,ea199a6768306e5ace1e256407231baab856c3e1@207.244.253.193:26656,297ceccd3456b5452b9eb67ec00f6fd2b19eff16@109.123.244.203:26656,e0f7bbe3488690b9140abad445d457c880d6eb09@62.113.116.106:26656,cc7902b0c693c5b7c70e735ab506dff1e5fc43a1@65.21.138.123:30656,0ab2e29faf1e38621494a209aa02bce66d621890@144.76.201.43:26056,9c3357bb1d50686b84f80eb5944422d44ea89633@188.234.163.227:26656,2e52b3afee8474c45dd2bb2252ee88e2676bff36@176.57.184.67:56656,7c904e8ac63be3ee7b0a4c37c2b20798191ab44e@65.109.69.240:26656,3b0267f2a91df87ad3a9b44c8e08dd6d6c5d8d0e@176.9.146.72:60856,1ff6b53d0f94eb272b7ed7ace7543d11d8a09bde@95.216.14.72:30656,5cc683adda09f97dee14e499189b4441e7416666@135.181.150.79:26656,2e1d457e19232ac434b141924952a2f401ad7fcf@141.95.104.246:26656,a4aa67fe8940cfc788df8d45cfd5d2892a1b9427@135.181.35.46:46656,1005e38e88d939ad47c2916a9533dec5352f74b3@185.250.37.162:31656,0436d8e4f5259d995c4dbcb0a75a8c1e3887f336@144.91.77.189:47456,114a60a83b80a4194d82b4f4fe39b8296c247f64@65.109.11.187:56656,1efee4ba6552299a8a8f62295930ec2309b6206e@65.109.24.227:31656,2d3c8b4299c3174d884ef68d3afb7
```
